mapper.sql: SELECT prdt_id, writer, prdt_name, prdt_desc, prdt_desc_detail, prdt_regdate, prdt_opendate, prdt_enddate, prdt_goal, prdt_currenttotal, prdt_open, prdt_desc_policy, prdt_genre, prdt_thumbnail, prdt_img , (prdt_enddate-prdt_opendate) as "prdt_dday" , (prdt_enddate+1) as "prdt_purchaseday" , (prdt_enddate-3) as "prdt_limitday" , (prdt_currenttotal/prdt_goal)*100 as "prdt_percent" , prdt_buyercnt , (prdt_opendate - current_date) as "prdt_comingday" FROM tb_product
mapper.select: select count(*) FROM tb_product WHERE TRUE AND prdt_name LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE TRUE AND prdt_name LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY prdt_regdate DESC, prdt_id DESC limit 6 offset #{offset}
